entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 17 April 2023
